lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: "For we walk by faith, not by sight." In life, not everything is what it seems. Instead of honing down on how you feel about a specific situation and possibly acting impulsively, take a deep breath and let your faith help you make a better decision.
context2: For we walk by faith, not by sight. Our humanity desires to know what's happening next, to have insight into where God is leading us, but walking with God sometimes means to walk in the dark.

lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: Remember: For we walk by faith, not by sight. Deconstruction can feel like walking in the dark, but it's a part of our faith journey. Keep walking, keep seeking. #FaithJourney #2Corinthians
context2: "For we walk by Faith, not by sight"What does this verse mean to you? To me, Faith is the unwavering light that illuminates our path even in the darkest of times. It's the anchor of God's love that keeps us steady when storms of doubt & fear are raging. With faith, we embrace the uncertain, trusting there is a greater plan. It empowers us to persevere &believe in miracles. Let it be the spark that ignites your spirit, reminding us you're never alone. Faith in God has power to move mountains & awaken the extraordinary within you.

lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: No day is ever "just another day." Each is a step on God's planned journey, full of opportunities. Share your journey, inspire others. Remember, "for we walk by faith, not by sight" Your path is your testimony - let it glow! And for those facing a tough day: You can do this. God's got you! 😍📍 ✨
context2: For we walk by faith, not by sight. The Lord will always walk with you through anything, no matter how big or scary it is. He will never leave you. ❤️ 😍🙏🌌

lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: Stepping into a new month and quarter calls for some faith refreshers! Tip 1: Don't let what you see shake you! As 2 Corinthians 5:7 says," for we walk by faith, not by sight." God's vision may not align with our current reality, but He sees the finished product.
context2: For we walk by faith, not by sight. I can't believe people still follow this Q nonsense after all these years. Your little false religion is in direct opposition to God and Christianity.

lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: For we walk by faith, not by sight! The CCP will never understand the power of faith and prayer and it will ultimately be their downfall!
context2: "For we walk by faith, not by sight." Keep the faith and trust that God is guiding your path, even when you can't see the way forward

lemma: For we walk by faith, not by sight
context1: I AM A FAITH WALKER FOR GOD: The best move that I have ever made was when I walked away from fear and stepped out on FAITH! IT IS WRITTEN: "For we walk by FAITH, not by sight."
context2: "For we walk by Faith, not by sight"What does this verse mean to you? To me, Faith is the unwavering light that illuminates our path even in the darkest of times. It's the anchor of God's love that keeps us steady when storms of doubt & fear are raging. With faith, we embrace the uncertain, trusting there is a greater plan. It empowers us to persevere &believe in miracles. Let it be the spark that ignites your spirit, reminding us you're never alone. Faith in God has power to move mountains & awaken the extraordinary within you.
